mapper.select: SELECT tab.TABLE_NAME, tab.TABLE_COMMENT, col.COLUMN_NAME, col.DATA_TYPE, col.COLUMN_COMMENT, IF(LENGTH(TRIM(col.COLUMN_KEY)) > 1, TRUE, FALSE) AS COLUMN_KEY FROM information_schema.`TABLES` tab LEFT JOIN information_schema.`COLUMNS` col ON tab.TABLE_NAME = col.TABLE_NAME WHERE tab.table_schema = ( SELECT DATABASE ( ) ) AND col.table_schema = ( SELECT DATABASE ( ) ) GROUP BY tab.TABLE_NAME, tab.TABLE_COMMENT, col.COLUMN_NAME, col.DATA_TYPE, col.COLUMN_COMMENT, col.COLUMN_KEY, col.ORDINAL_POSITION ORDER BY tab.TABLE_NAME, col.ORDINAL_POSITION
